Hey all,
I am going to rephrase my question.
I guess what I am trying to figure out is if I should
have a SearchController which has "The Brain" (the
neural net) and then when it searches it filters the
search results through the weights to get the ranking
OR 
does each Search result have a brain?
Any thoughts, ideas?
Thanks,
Rog
